summary.notes: IBM Torino results from job d65ncqoqbmes739d4h30. 11 bond distances (0.5-3.0A), all fail chemical accuracy. HeH+ is harder than H2 on hardware because optimal theta varies more across bond distances, and small X0X1/Y0Y1 correlator signals are lost in noise.
